description:
Lorena Aldana


Universidad de San Buenaventura


Social Networks:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/lorena.aldana.blanco
Github: https://github.com/lorena-aldana/
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/lorena-aldana-5ab90656/




Briefly explained, sonification means to transform data into sound with the purpose of conveying information. In this talk, I will explain how sonification could serve as a supporting tool for cardiac diagnosis and monitoring, and how you could use Python to create sonifications from electrocardiogram (ECG) data.

title: Using Python to listen to your heart
